Desc.entry: Sheffield Stay Put Scheme is a not-for-profit home improvement agency operated by Yorkshire Housing Foundation in partnership with Sheffield City Council. Operates in the Sheffield area, providing independent advice on repairs, improvements and adaptions for both owner occupiers and private tenants, particularly those aged over 60 years or disabled people of any age. The scheme offers free home safety checks, benefit check, technical advice and help with choosing a builder, as well as form filling, help with applying for local authority grants, applying for schemes which release money tied up in the value of your home and getting access to charitable funding. Company limited by guarantee no 2574084.
